raw_comment: I noticed that the legacy applicants with parents of a higher income are more likely to get accepted. I wonder why colleges are more likely to accept students with more money or legacy students even though a first-generation student with less money may be a much better fit for the school. This applies to me because I am a first-generation student in a wealthy community.
ace_sentences: I noticed that a legacy applicant with parents with a higher income is more likely to get accepted.
I wonder why a college is more likely to accept a student with more money.
I wonder why a college is more likely to accept a legacy student.
A first-generation student with less money may be a much better fit for the school.
I live in a wealthy community.
